price: 81. Yeey! isin (yahuud kinnuk) kah ittan inna hinnay gira sin xagele, le umaanc koroosannut kafissi hayteeh le dambi maro edde hee mari, toysa woo mari girâ maraay usun umman teetil waaran.
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَن كَسَبَ سَيِّئَةٗ وَأَحَٰطَتۡ بِهِۦ خَطِيٓـَٔتُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: balā man kasaba sayyi-atan wa-aḥāṭat bihi khaṭīatuhu fa-ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
